properties.name: learning_rate
properties.label: Learning rate
properties.description: Learning rate used for training with gradient descent.

properties.name: model_architecture
properties.label: Model architecture
properties.description: Architecture of the Neural Network as defined by Keras model.json().

properties.name: optimizer
properties.label: Optimizer
properties.description: Name of the optimizer to use for training.

properties.name: nesterov
properties.label: Nesterov
properties.description: Flag indicating if the momentum optimizer is Nesterov or not.

properties.name: loss
properties.label: Loss Function
properties.description: Type of loss to minimize during training.

properties.name: metric
properties.label: Metric
properties.description: Type of metric to display during training.

properties.name: batch_size
properties.label: Batch size
properties.description: Size of the batch to use for training in each worker locally.

properties.name: num_epochs
properties.label: Number of epochs
properties.description: Number of epochs to train in each worker locally before sending the result to the master.

properties.name: model_averaging
properties.label: Model averaging
properties.description: Whether to use model averaging (True) or gradient averaging (False).

properties.name: sigma
properties.label: Sigma factor.
properties.description: The parameter of the gaussian kernel.

properties.name: C
properties.label: Error penalty
properties.description: The cost parameter in the cost function.

properties.name: NmaxiterGD
properties.label: Max number of iterations.
properties.description: Maximum number of communication rounds for the gradient descent.

properties.name: eta
properties.label: Learning rate
properties.description: Step of the gradient descent algorithm.

properties.label: Number of epochs at workers
properties.description: Number of epochs in every worker before sending the weights to the master node in every iteration.

properties.name: mu
properties.label: Learning rate
properties.description: Step of the gradient descent algorithm.

properties.name: eps
properties.label: Threshold
properties.description: Threshold to update the a variables in the IRWLS algorithm.

name: KR
label: Kernel Regression
description: Kernel Regression model using Gaussian kernels.

properties.name: mu
properties.label: Learning rate
properties.description: Learning rate value to update model using gradient descent.

properties.name: fsigma
properties.label: Sigma factor.
properties.description: Factor to obtain the sigma value as fsigma * sqrt(NI), where NI is the number of inputs.

properties.name: C
properties.label: Centroids.
properties.description: Centroids to be used for the computation of the kernels.

name: BSVM
label: Budget Support Vector Machine
description: Support Vector Machine model with controlled complexity (budget) using Gaussian kernels.

properties.name: mu
properties.label: Learning rate
properties.description: Learning rate value to update model using gradient descent.

properties.name: Csvm
properties.label: Error penalty
properties.description: Penalization of every nonzero slack variable.

properties.name: fsigma
properties.label: Sigma factor.
properties.description: Factor to obtain the sigma value as fsigma * sqrt(NI), where NI is the number of inputs.

properties.name: C
properties.label: Centroids.
properties.description: Centroids to be used for the computation of the kernels, row-wise stored to build a NCxNI matrix.
